verses.verse: <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G4891>you<s%> were <S%G4891>raised<s%> together with <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> the things that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G507>above,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2521>is,<s%> seated <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
Set your <S%G5426>mind<s%> on the <S%G3588>things<s%> that are <S%G507>above,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> on the <S%G3588>things<s%> that are <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

Put to <S%G3499>death<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth:<s%> sexual <S%G4202>immorality,<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness,<s%> depraved <S%G3806>passion,<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1939>desire,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1495>idolatry;<s%>

<S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G5574>lie<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> seeing that you have put <S%G554>off<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4234>doings,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> have put <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G341>man,<s%> who is being renewed <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1504>image<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2936>Creator,<s%>

<S%G430>bearing<s%> with one <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5483>forgiving<s%> each <S%G1438>other,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> has a <S%G3437>complaint<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G5100>any;<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5483>forgave<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> also <S%G2532>do.<s%>

<S%G1774>Let<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1774>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4146>richly;<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3560>admonishing<s%> one <S%G1438>another<s%> with <S%G5568>psalms,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5215>hymns,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5603>songs,<s%> <S%G103>singing<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3748>Whatever<s%> <S%G3956><s%> you <S%G302>do,<s%> <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2041>deed,<s%> do <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> giving <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1401>Servants,<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> those who are your <S%G2962>masters<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> just <S%G1722>when<s%> they are <S%G3787>looking,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> men <S%G441>pleasers,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G572>singleness<s%> of <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G5399>fearing<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> you will <S%G618>receive<s%> the <S%G469>reward<s%> of the <S%G2817>inheritance;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> you <S%G1398>serve<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> he who does <S%G91>wrong<s%> will receive again for the <S%G2865>wrong<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he has <S%G91>done,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4382>partiality.<s%>
